definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Do not pressurize or expose to open flame or heat.
sentences.chinese: 不要给空容器加压，不要放在明火或热源附近。

sentences.english: In order to prevent the artificial open fuse blasting caused the injury accident, the blasting technique was improved.
sentences.chinese: 为防止人工明火放炮对人身伤害，改进了爆破技术。

sentences.english: The gas is does, endure is the enemy, but to leave the bitterest curse of ground, children in crops.
sentences.chinese: 气是无明火，忍是敌灾星，但留方寸地，把于子孙耕。

sentences.english: Do not use direct fire with fire.
It has the same therapy effects as the cupping with open fire.
sentences.chinese: 与明火拔罐具有同样治疗效果。

sentences.english: To ask such prices is sheer robbery .
sentences.chinese: 要这样的价钱简直是明火执仗的抢劫。

sentences.english: No smoking and using fire directly in the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 车间内严禁吸烟和用明火作业。

sentences.english: Is it safe anywhere near a naked flame?
Fire curing uses an enclosed barn similar to that used for flue-curing.
sentences.chinese: 明火调制使用一个附上的仓，类似于烟熏。

sentences.english: Prohibit using a direct fire or liquating paint under airtight condition.
sentences.chinese: 禁止使用明火加温或在密闭状态下熔解漆料。

sentences.english: Don't use candles or any open flames.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用蜡烛或任何明火。

sentences.english: Don't take combustible and explosive goods to public places where there are naked flames.
sentences.chinese: 不要把易燃爆的东西带到有明火的公众场合。

sentences.english: You the so explicit bombard keep battle, where take live a person?
sentences.chinese: 您这么明火执仗的，哪里拿得住人？

sentences.english: Do not use open-flame vessels for heating or thawing on the rig floor.
sentences.chinese: 钻台上不能用任何明火用具取热或解冻。

sentences.english: Do not permit smoking or open flames in any area where liquid hydrogen is stored or handled.
sentences.chinese: 在任何储存和操作液氢的区域，严禁吸烟或明火。

sentences.english: Do not permit smoking or open flames in any areas where liquid oxygen is stored or handled.
sentences.chinese: 在任何储存和操作液氧的区域，严禁吸烟或明火。

definition: to catch fire/to cook/to get angry
